overview: Sandeep Sandhar has been a part of the corporate world for a long time working with brands such as National Geographic Channel, FOX Traveller, Maruti India pvt. ltd. and Samsung. He is an avid mountaineer, trekker, a photographer, a poet by the monsoons and a state level sportsman. He’s an MBA from IMT Ghaziabad and has worked with top corporates in the area of Marketing &Sales Strategy, Brand Launches & Brand Re-positioning. Leaving 11 years of corporate experience behind and travelling through 25 out of 28 states in India, climbed 5000+ mt peaks and done numerous treks on the way. He specialises in Ladakh, Spiti, Himachal, Uttaranchal & North East trips. He brings in a lot of enthusiasm and passion for travel and adventure, for that’s where his heart lies.
